```{r}
#| message: false
# Read and format data
resources <- readr::read_csv("Data/resources.csv") |>
  dplyr::mutate(
    Link = kableExtra::cell_spec(
      stringr::str_remove_all(Link, "https://|/$"),
      format = "html",
      link = Link
    )
  )

# Function to make table
resources_table <- function(Category, data = resources) {
  output <- data |>
    dplyr::filter(Type == Category) |>
    dplyr::select(-Type) |>
    dplyr::arrange(Title) |> 
    knitr::kable("html", escape = FALSE)
  return(output)
}
```


# Blogs
